breath.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the air that you send out of your lungs when you breathe
breath.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Leo could smell the wine on her breath.
breath.translation[0].definitions[1].def: air that you take into your lungs

breath.translation[0].definitions[2].def: an amount of air that you take into your lungs
breath.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Shaun took a deep breath and dived in.
breath.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a very small amount or a sign of something
breath.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: They did everything they could to avoid the slightest breath of scandal.
